name: Game Breaker (Demo)
description:
Game Breaker is the story-driven RPG that wants you to cheat. This is a two-hour long demo from the successful Kickstarter campaign from July 2021. 
The game is aimed at releasing in early 2023, with a total length of over 40 hours.

All info and social media: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/gamebreaker/game-breaker

Updated: December 3rd, 2021
